audioText: Ma grand-mère prenait toujours le temps de trier le linge blanc du linge de couleur avant chaque lessive.
question: What did the grandmother always take time to do before each wash?
options: Sort white laundry from colored laundry.
Check all pockets for forgotten items.
Measure the right amount of detergent.
explanation: The text states 'Ma grand-mère prenait toujours le temps de trier le linge blanc du linge de couleur avant chaque lessive' - My grandmother always took the time to sort white laundry from colored laundry before each wash. 'Prenait' is the imperfect form of 'prendre' (to take), third person singular, describing a habitual past action.
